Verses: 1 karththar Raajarigampannugiraar; Boomi Poorippaagi, Thiralaana Theevugal Magizhakkadavadhu.
2 megamum Mandhaaramum Avarai Soozhndhirukkiradhu; Needhiyum Niyaayamum Avarudaiya Singaasanaththin Aadhaaram.
3 akkini Avarukku Munsendru, Sutrilum Irukkira Avarudaiya Saththurukkalai Sutterikkiradhu.
4 avarudaiya Minnalgal Poochchakkaraththaip Piragaasippiththadhu; Boomi Adhaik Kandu Adhirndhadhu.
5 karththarin Pirasannaththinaal Parvadhangal Mezhugupola Urugitru, Sarva Boomiyinudaiya Aandavarin Pirasannaththinaaleye Urugippoyitru.
6 vaanangal Avarudaiya Needhiyai Velippaduththugiradhu; Sagala Janangalum Avarudaiya Magimaiyaik Kaangiraargal.
7 soroobangalai Vanangi, Vikkiragangalaippatrip Perumaipaaraattugira Yaavarum Vetkappattup Povaargalaaga; Dhevargale, Neengalellaarum Avaraith Thozhudhukollungal.
8 seeyon Kettu Magizhndhadhu; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugalinimiththam Yoodhaavin Kumaaraththigal Kalikoorndhaargal.
9 karththaave, Boomi Muzhuvadhukkum Neer Unnadhamaanavar; Ellaa Dhevargalilum Neere Migavum Uyarndhavar.
10 karththaril Anbukoorugiravargale, Theemaiyai Veruththuvidungal; Avar Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangalin Aaththumaakkalaik Kaappaatri, Dhunmaarkkarin Kaikku Avargalaith Thappuvikkiraar.
11 needhimaanukkaaga Velichchamum, Semmaiyaana Irudhayaththaarukkaaga Magizhchchiyum Vidhaikkappattirukkiradhu.
12 needhimaangale, Karththarukkul Magizhndhu, Avarudaiya Parisuththaththin Ninaivukoorudhalaik Kondaadungal.
